title: @Meddler Your thoughts about Zyra
body:
Can you tell me something? Are you thinking about nerf or buff for her?
I prefer don't touching her or eventually buff, but i want to see your opinion.

replies.body:
Yeah Meddler dropped the ball on that one.

omg rito was better at 2010 bring back the puns

>
> No current plans.

How about a skin? I haven't bought rp from you guys in over a year and half and i would really really like to! But so long as zyra gets no skin love, my account gets no new skins.
If any changes come, whould riot balance zyra around the midlane or the support role ?

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YafeFiXj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-30T18:58:30.169+0000)
>
> No current plans.

Is there any way that Zyra can have her old Q revert to the circle shape back because the new rectangular shape is not only unsatisfying to use since it has smaller hit box in vertical line but also shorter in range due to its shape not being a circle. I understand that it's easier to summon plants out because it has a longer horizontal line but if you add an outer circle range to the original old circle Q, it would also be easier to summon plants out too. I know this is a bit too much to ask but after the Q  rework, I never feel satisfy using her Q, not just because its damage is lower, but its wonky rectangular shape. I do see a lot of Zyra players feel the same way like I do so I hope you re-consider this. Thank you for reading. Sorry for the bad English.

[Remember when you guys said you planned to balance Zyra around both mid and support](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/xVQr7ihf-mid-year-mage-updates-zyra-direction?comment=002e000300000001000b0009)? How about you actually start doing that? [Mid Zyra currently has an abysmal winrate for a champion with such a low playrate.](http://lolalytics.com/champion/Zyra/)
What about Twitch? You think reducing the Q duration will be enough?

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YafeFiXj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-30T18:58:30.169+0000)
>
> No current plans.

And for teemo?
You think zyra needs a buff? lol

> [{quoted}](name=HazyCloud7,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YafeFiXj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-30T21:20:19.559+0000)
>
> You think zyra needs a buff? lol

Nah. Just a skin. Preferably a void one. We don't have a purple zyra yet.

She doesn't need a nerf or a buff, she needs to be rebalanced with a mix of both.

One of the things that Riot said they were going to do during the MYMU was to [balance Zyra around bot mid and support](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/xVQr7ihf-mid-year-mage-updates-zyra-direction?comment=002e000300000001000b0009). Currently [mid Zyra is incredibly weak while support Zyra is probably a bit too strong](http://lolalytics.com/champion/Zyra/), so she needs to receive buffs that favour her mid role along side nerfs mostly aimed at support.

Any buff to mid lane zyra = buff to support zyra

Don't forget support zyra builds 3-4 ap items + sorc shoes.

>Don't forget support zyra builds 3-4 ap items + sorc shoes.

She builds AP in significantly lower amounts and significantly slower than mid laners. At 30 minutes a support Zyra may be around 200 AP while mid Zyra will probably be around 400. If Deathcap ever becomes a legitimate option that would be in the order of 550. Nerfing per level damage and buffing ratios would definitely shift Zyra towards mid.
Yeah thats a good way to accomplish it, an accompanying base damage nerf would do the trick.
Most overrated character in the entire game tbh
